response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. We understand its value to you stands at $800,000, and based on our assessment of its market position and potential impact, we have tailored our offer to reflect its true worth while considering your budget.

We kindly propose to sell the product to you at a price of $950,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and customization services to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems and processes. We believe this price not only represents a fair valuation but also provides a competitive edge compared to market rates for similar products and services.

Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget considerations. We are confident that our product will significantly contribute to your business goals and look forward to the possibility of working together.

Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details in more depth, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
